/usr/bin/c++   -fPIC -O3 -march=native -Wall -Wextra -Wno-unused-parameter -Wno-strict-aliasing  -std=c++11 -std=gnu++11 -g    CMakeFiles/Infinitam.dir/main.cpp.o  -o Infinitam -rdynamic Engine/libEngine.a Utils/libUtils.a -lLpSensor -lpthread -ldl -lrt -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext ITMLib/libITMLib.a Utils/libUtils.a -lpng -lz /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudart.so -lcublas -lOpenNI2 -lLpSensor -lpthread -ldl -lrt -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64
